definitions.definition: The quality of being agile ; the power of moving the limbs quickly and easily; quickness of motion
examples: His superior agility countered his lack of strength.

definitions.definition: A faculty of being agile in body, mind, or figuratively.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The quality of being agile ; the power of moving the limbs quickly and easily; quickness of motion
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A faculty of being agile in body, mind, or figuratively.
